title: Blood & Betrayal
description: She's my temptation, and one I intend on savoring.VovaWorking for Kronid isn't easy. In fact, it's hard work, but I like this line of work. My days are never the same and I'm always doing something different. The only constant is that we operate out of a high-end tattoo parlor in Moscow. It's where my one desire has been taunting in front of me for years---Meghan.She's a tattoo artist with vibrant pink hair and a body that makes every man stare. For so long, I never planned on pursuing her, but one night she and her friends invite us out for drinks. It's the night that everything changes between us, and once I get a taste of her I can't stop.Just as we're exploring each other, things become intense with work. Lives are at stake. Danger is lurking around every corner and I'm doing everything I can to keep her safe.***Blood & Betrayal is the third book in E.C. Land and Elizabeth Knox's Pins & Needles series. Pins & Needles is a dark romance series that goes over multiple triggering subjects, and includes intense criminal elements. Please proceed with caution.
author: E.C. Land
